properties.areaDesc: Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet NY out 20 nm; Long Island Sound East of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; Peconic and Gardiners Bays; Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm; South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through Shinnecock Bay
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 9 at 3:18AM EST until January 9 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 3 to 5 feet on the ocean.

* WHERE...Long Island Sound East of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson
NY, Peconic and Gardiners Bays, South Shore Bays from Jones
Inlet through Shinnecock Bay, Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches
Inlet NY out 20 nm and Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet NY
out 20 nm.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
